entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is described as sitting in a corner on a low wooden stool, looking pale and clammy. She is one of the champions.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is described as looking even surlier than usual, which Harry supposes is his way of showing nerves. He is one of the champions.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is pacing up and down and gives Harry a small smile when he enters. He is one of the champions.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is described as looking like a slightly overblown cartoon figure, standing amid all the pale-faced champions. He is wearing his old Wasp robes again.

relationships.description: Bagman greets Fleur Delacour warmly, saying 'Harry! Good-o!' and inviting him to make himself at home.
Bagman greets Viktor Krum warmly, saying 'Harry! Good-o!' and inviting him to make himself at home.
Bagman greets Cedric warmly, saying 'Harry! Good-o!' and inviting him to make himself at home.
Bagman invites Harry to make himself at home, saying 'Come in, come in, make yourself at home!'
